body_html: I agree with @jlebar on not relying on the log messages from the DSO loader. It seems that there are two possible solutions to this issue: either adding a log message indicating CUDA support is enabled at a higher level or providing an API for users to retrieve these info. Both solutions would require poking around with stream executor code. Please refer to comments in #4090 to find out why currently in TensorFlow there is not an API for retrieving CUDA related library info. I will add "contributions welcome" label for this issue as I do not have any cycle to work on this in the near future.
